properties.title: Swiss National Park House
properties.abstract: The renowned Grisons architect Valerio Olgiati was responsible for designing the new visitors' centre, a distinctive, monolithic building. Here you will find a permanent as well as a temporary exhibition, extensive and interactive.
properties.description:
Let Nature's mysteries and her everyday marvels capture your imagination as you discover them on walks through the National Park. Find out how things are linked in the ecology and learn about crucial partnerships. In four rooms of the visitors' centre and covering an area of 680 m2, scientific facts but also sensory and mystical information are yours to experience.

For children, this centre with its explorer's trail hides a special surprise. Using an explorer booklet, you have to find your own way through the exhibition, all the while learning exciting and thrilling things about nature.

An audio guide in five languages provides you with interesting information and details on the permanent exhibition.
